review: It's a great device, I'm happy with it.
author: Delia Correia

review: I love it. Was easy to install and works great
author: Marylou Turlington

review: Already had Amazon Fire TV and i'm a prime member. I bought the Fire TV stick for a second tv that I normally watch. Both products are very easy to install and operation of apps is smooth My wife watches the series type shows from some app & I watch mostly movies so the Amazon Prime network app isgreat for me. Zero commercials-WooHoo!!  The equiptment is made very nicely also. Some TV remotes look sloppy even before the food & all becomes part of them. The Amazon products exude quality when removed from the packaging as well as when operating them. Thanks Amazon.
author: Larry

review: Was working great. Less than a month later, I can't watch amything on Netflix because of this constant error message. Feeling like I need to return this and find something better.
author: Amazon Customer "KR"

review: It's the best thing for kids and adults ...

review: Very easy to use; love the access to all the content.
